tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE returned_items (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255),
  condition VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE routing_log (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	item_id INT,
	rule_id INT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES returned_items(item_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (rule_id) REFERENCES routing_rules(rule_id)
);
